abilities.name: Flash Fire
abilities.description: The Pokémon's Fire-type moves have a 20% chance to trigger. If the Pokémon takes an electric-type move, the Fire-type moves' power is doubled

abilities.name: Drought
abilities.description: Makes every field a Dry Field. What Darkrai moves will cause the field permanently. First affects all Pokémon LLC party have a Rain or PG Show up once
